prompts:
/refactor lets implement @ai_docs/plan.md and verify using the tools , Implementation Plan - Big 3 Super Agent Refactor
Refactoring the Big 3 Super Agent to TypeScript using Effect-TS, as per 
ai_docs/plan.md
.

Proposed Changes
Dependencies
Install runtime dependencies:
@anthropic-ai/sdk
google-generative-ai
ws
playwright
dotenv
Install dev dependencies:
@types/ws
Source Code
[NEW] 
domain.ts
Define AgentSession, AgentTool types, and AgentError class.
[NEW] 
CoderService.ts
Define CoderService interface and CoderServiceLive layer.
Implement Claude interaction using @anthropic-ai/sdk.
[NEW] 
BrowserService.ts
Define BrowserService interface and BrowserServiceLive layer.
Implement Playwright control and Gemini integration.
[NEW] 
VoiceService.ts
Define VoiceService interface and VoiceServiceLive layer.
Implement WebSocket connection to OpenAI Realtime API.
[NEW] 
main.ts
Implement the main orchestrator program.
Compose services and run the event loop.
Configuration
[MODIFY] 
package.json
Add start script: "start": "tsx src/main.ts".
Verification Plan
Automated Tests
Run pnpm check to verify TypeScript compilation.
Run pnpm start to verify the agent starts (will likely fail without API keys, but should compile and attempt connection).
Manual Verification
Verify that the application compiles.
Verify that the services are correctly wired.
